recipesJson.name: cheesecake ice cream with strawberry syrup
recipesJson.author: Thadentman
recipesJson.description: Just a simple recipe that requires an overnight steep and is very tasty.

reviews.text: I replaced all the other strawberry flavors in this with 2.5% FA Juicy Strawb and it tastes exactly like the strawberry cheesecake ice cream you can get with the ribbons of strawberry syrup and chunks of pie crust.  It's a beautiful thing.

pageContext.name: cheesecake ice cream with strawberry syrup
